DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if Geranium oil will relieve a variety of neuropathic pain and some pain relief will last more than 48 hours.
DOC.brief_title: EPT 100: Geranium Oil for the Relief of Neuropathic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: EPT 100 study is designed to identify the percentage of people who experience neuropathic pain relief from topical geranium oil from Reunion Island, determine which neuropathic pain conditions respond best and define the time course of the pain relief.
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or oler Neuralgia or neuropathy with daily pain At least moderate intensity pain Signed informed consent Pregnant or nursing Known allergies to geranium oil or geranium oil fractions
